label: Scalar Field Equation of Motion
mathematical_goal: Derive Klein-Gordon equation for scalar field (pneuma) from variational principle
theoretical_significance: The pneuma field (G2 modulus) obeys the Klein-Gordon equation derived from a standard scalar Lagrangian. This provides the dynamical foundation for dark energy evolution and moduli stabilization. The potential V(phi) is constrained by G2 geometry.

geometry.pneuma_connection: phi = Re(T) is the G2 Kahler modulus

derivation_chain: Scalar field Lagrangian: L = T - V
